name: Alex Davidson
content: home research teaching blog cv alex davidson ================ i am a professor auxiliar (assistant professor) in the Faculdade de Ciências at Universidade de Lisboa i research new methods for designing and implementing efficient cryptographic primitives and protocols if you are pursuing phd or post-doc funding opportunities related to cryptography, privacy, and security, get in touch! previously: assistant professor, NOVA FCT cryptography researcher at brave post-doctoral researcher in the social physics and complexity research group, supervised by prof. Joana G. Sá cryptography engineer at cloudflare cryptography research intern at ntt, tokyo, mentored by Ryo Nishimaki phd student at royal holloway, university of london, supervised by prof. Carlos Cid email me at: research stuff: alex.davidson@fc.ul.pt other things: coela@alxdavids.xyz i'm also available as @alxdavids in the obvious places
